Controllers

Class ControllerQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.ControllerQuestion

  • public class ControllerQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ControllerOpponent is used to create a game. It will display all online users and give the user the opportunity to challenge a player.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

      • sceneResult

        public void sceneResult(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The method changes scene to Result.
        Parameters:
        event - is a necessary parameter which is used in a method from the class ChangeScene.

      • nextQuestion

        public void nextQuestion()
        The method checks if all questions have been answered. If all questions are answered it will update the player's gameId and update the game and set you as finished. If not all questions are answered, display next question and start the countdown.

      • confirmAnswer

        public void confirmAnswer()
        The method is connected to the confirm button and uses questionCheck to validate the answer.

      • questionDisplay

        public void questionDisplay()
        The method displays the question by using questionInfo.

      • questionInfo

        public java.lang.String questionInfo()
        The method fetches the questions from the database depending on the category. It will save the answers of every questions and the user's input to keep track of the score.
        Returns:
        the question text.

      • enter

        public void enter()
        The method gives user the option to press enter on the keyboard rather than the button. It will then use the confirmAnswer-method.

      • findScore

        public int findScore(java.lang.String answer)
        The method checks the score of your input. It will add the score to your total score the same game.
        Parameters:
        answer - is the user's input.
        Returns:
        the score of your answer.

      • findUser

        public static java.lang.String findUser()
        The method checks if the user is player 1 or player 2
        Returns:
        a String if the player is either 1 or 2 or else it will return game deleted.

      • turnOffTimer

        public void turnOffTimer()
        The method terminates the timer
